title: Win+X (developer menu) fix it back! cmd.exe + ubuntu bash
body:
You removed from Windows 10 developer menu (win+x) cmd.exe and replaced it with Powershell. Powershell is ok but return cmd.exe as soon as possible, please. Good idea is also to add Ubuntu bash there.
Happy that win+r works. If you add there option to run as admin it's enough for me.

comments.body: Have a look in Settings -> Personalisation -> Taskbar and you should see an option to change it back to cmd.exe
